name: 意大利文（一）
description: This is a one-year elementary course of the Italian language, lasting through two semesters. The first semester starts from pronunciation and the most basic grammar (gender and number of names); then it proceeds to the conjugation of verbs. Together with the grammar rules, students learn some three hundred words, and also practice basic conversation. Students are often encouraged to make use of the Internet to improve their language skills, both by perusing Italian sites and exploring things Italian (tourist places, monuments, food, festivals, etc.), and by visiting Italian language courses in the Internet. By the end of the semester, students are expected to read Italian texts correctly, to express greetings and other basic conversation, and to formulate simple sentences in a correct way.
syllabus:
week 1 Pronunciation  
week 2 Pronunciation   
week 3 Lesson One (Gender of names)  
week 4 Lesson One: practice and conversation  
week 5 Lesson Two (Plurals)  
week 6Lesson Three: (Pronouns and basic verbs)  
week 7 Midterm exam  
week 8 Lesson Three: practice and conversation  
week 9 Lesson Four (Conjugation of regular verbs)  
week 10 Lesson Four: practice. Pronunciation test.  
week 11 Lesson Five (Main irregular verbs; prepositions)  
week 12 Lesson five: practice and conversation.   
week 13  Lesson six (Personal pronouns)   
week 14  Final revision
